function.name: check_slot_cost
function.description: Given an offered appointment time, decide if we should accept it or push for earlier. Return acceptable + suggested counter-offer. Never include cost wording meant for the warehouse. The tool response is the SINGLE SOURCE OF TRUTH - always follow its accept/reject decision.

offeredTimeText.description: Raw time phrase from the warehouse manager (e.g., '3 PM', 'tomorrow at 6 AM', 'end of day')

offeredDayOffset.description: Day offset: 0=today, 1=tomorrow, 2=day after. Set to 1 if warehouse says 'tomorrow', 'next day', 'tmrw', or 'morning'/'first thing' when it's afternoon/evening. CRITICAL for correct multi-day cost calculation.

extractedTermsJson.description: JSON string of extracted contract terms (optional)

driverHOSJson.description: JSON string of driver HOS status (optional, required if hosEnabled=true)
